actions.name: CloneBackend
actions.description: Grants permission to clone an existing Amplify Admin backend environment into a new Amplify Admin backend enviroment

actions.name: CreateBackend
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amplify Admin backend environment by Amplify appId

actions.name: CreateBackendAPI
actions.description: Grants permission to create an API for an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: CreateBackendAuth
actions.description: Grants permission to create an auth resource for an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: CreateBackendConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amplify Admin backend config by Amplify appId

actions.name: CreateBackendStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to create a backend storage resource

actions.name: CreateToken
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amplify Admin challenge token by appId

actions.name: DeleteBackend
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: DeleteBackendAPI
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an API of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: DeleteBackendAuth
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an auth resource of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: DeleteBackendStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a backend storage resource

actions.name: DeleteToken
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amplify Admin challenge token by appId

actions.name: GenerateBackendAPIModels
actions.description: Grants permission to generate models for an API of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackend
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackendAPI
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an API of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackendAPIModels
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve models for an API of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackendAuth
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an auth resource of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackendJob
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a job of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: GetBackendStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing backend storage resource

actions.name: GetToken
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an Amplify Admin challenge token by appId

actions.name: ImportBackendAuth
actions.description: Grants permission to import an existing auth resource of an Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: ImportBackendStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to import an existing backend storage resource

actions.name: ListBackendJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the jobs of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: ListS3Buckets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve s3 buckets

actions.name: RemoveAllBackends
actions.description: Grants permission to delete all existing Amplify Admin backend environments by appId

actions.name: RemoveBackendConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amplify Admin backend config by Amplify appId

actions.name: UpdateBackendAPI
actions.description: Grants permission to update an API of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: UpdateBackendAuth
actions.description: Grants permission to update an auth resource of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: UpdateBackendConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amplify Admin backend config by Amplify appId

actions.name: UpdateBackendJob
actions.description: Grants permission to update a job of an existing Amplify Admin backend environment by appId and backendEnvironmentName

actions.name: UpdateBackendStorage
actions.description: Grants permission to update a backend storage resource
